home.title:
Welcome to
Deep Blue Fuerteventura
home.subtitle: Years of diving experience in the Atlantic - One of the most established dive centers on Fuerteventura
home.feature1Desc: Years of experience in the Atlantic waters. SSI and PADI certified instructors.
home.feature2Desc: Caleta de Fuste and Las Playitas. Choose your perfect dive site.
home.feature3Desc: From beginners to advanced divers. Discover, Open Water, Advanced, and more.
home.caletaDesc: The yacht harbour, which is also the location of our dive centre, has a flair that is all its own. Transatlantic sailing boats and other yachts regularly make port here.
home.caletaAddress:
Muelle Deportivo / Calle Teneriffe
E - 35610 Caleta de Fuste - Fuerteventura
home.playitasDesc: The hotel and dive base are designed for sports-minded people. Las Playitas Resort is known in the sporting world as a training destination for professional athletes.
home.playitasAddress:
Hotel Gran Resort Las Playitas
Las Playitas - Fuerteventura
home.ctaSubtitle: Book your dive today and discover the Atlantic waters of Fuerteventura

booking.includesDiscover: Discover Scuba includes equipment and instructor
booking.includesOrientation: Orientation dive for certified divers (includes tank, weights, boat trip)

diveSites.title: Our Dive Sites
diveSites.caletaDesc: Discover the stunning reefs and diverse marine life of Caleta de Fuste. From beginner-friendly sites to advanced challenges, there's something for everyone.
diveSites.playitasDesc: The Las Playitas location offers excellent diving conditions with crystal clear waters and abundant marine life.

siteDescriptions.anfiteatro: Among the overhanging rocks along the whole reef are scorpion fish, grouperfish, trumpet fish and greater silver smelt. At a depth of about 12 meters, barracudas are waiting for their prey, while curious amber jacks eye the divers closely from nearby.
siteDescriptions.barranco: A beautiful reef with overhangs and columns. Swarms of striped breams, zebra breams and yellow-finned mackerel are also found here. In the columns and holes different moray species have made their homes; Tiger morays, Duke Augustus morays and large masked morays are not a rarity here.
siteDescriptions.fortaleza: A rocky wall, which rises vertically up from the sloping sea floor between 18 and 12 meters deep, to 3 meters below the surface. Around this dive site you will find a lot of wreck debris, which is testimony to the fact that these reefs have proved to be a disaster for many ships.
siteDescriptions.mole: Here you are in the kindergarten of the Atlantic. In addition to swarms of young barracudas, striped bream and sardines there are always octopus and squid on site, sometimes you can also find the odd seahorse. In the winter months angel sharks make the spot their own.
siteDescriptions.la_emboscada: This dive site above the reef is very close to the coast. The beautiful underwater landscape with impressive rock formations, the possibilities to swim through them and the great depth differences make every dive here very variable.
siteDescriptions.camino_de_altura: Here you will find some very nice swim throughs outside the reef. Close to the big wall there are a few cool overhangs, in which groupers feel comfortable. Larger fish such as tuna, bonito, yellowtail mackerel are also common in this area.
siteDescriptions.el_muellito: The reef begins here at a depth of 7 meters and thus offers the escaping sardines protection from hunting amber jacks and blue perch. At a depth of 23 meters there is a wildly rugged gorge that can be dived to a length of about 12 meters.
siteDescriptions.el_tazar: Huge swarms of monkfish are often found here on the reef's edge. A little further into the deep blue depths swarms of large barracudas can be found circling. A bit deeper between the rock formations you can find, for example, grouper, parrotfish, sea bass and yard eels.
siteDescriptions.tesoro_negro: Dark and mysterious. The name of the dive site is fitting: bizarre black corals grow on the reef walls. The wall is home to very beautiful sponges, anemones and nudibranches. At the foot of the wall under the overhangs you can see fields of peacock feathers and cylinder roses.
siteDescriptions.el_portal: The rocky wall with a swim through leading out into the deep blue depths is a little bit in front of the reef itself. Here one has the best views to see big fish: from tuna fish with a length of 2 meters to swarms of big amber jacks which are up to 1.80 meters long and up to the whale sharks with their cute spots.
siteDescriptions.el_mirador: We must first cross a ravine here in order to arrive at a somewhat advanced rock formation. Here, with the view into the deep blue, swarms of bonitos and amber jacks pass by. Between the rocks the eagle ray rests and floats in search of food.
siteDescriptions.el_laberinto: The name says it all: the labyrinth is a wild underwater landscape, which is still surprising after many dives. Barracuda, bonito, angel sharks can be seen here. At the edge of the reef there are usually huge swarms of sardines, which are hunted and chased by tuna.
siteDescriptions.la_piramide: A fight between teenagers is not a rarity here: Behind the reef's edge at a depth of about 26 meters, a whole band of half-grown groupers is waiting between the rocks to tussle with free swimming morays. Close to the pyramid you sometimes meet sea turtles who are in search of food.
siteDescriptions.el_monasterio: A whole labyrinth of rocky gorges awaits you behind the reef's edge. They remind us of the narrow walls of a monastery. Between the rocks you can find stately octopuses and large sepias. In front of the rocky passages on the bright sandy bottom, various rays search for food.
siteDescriptions.nuevo_horizonte: Nuevo Horizonte, vor Costa Caleta (Caleta de la Camella). Large fish such as tuna, bonito, amber jacks and barracudas are regularly sighted here. Doradas, Badis, Barracudas and Tuna come curiously towards the reef. In February and March, a lot of angel sharks come here to mate.

about.title: About Us
about.philosophyQuote: The Red Sea is the zoo, the Atlantic the safari!
about.philosophyDesc: With years of diving experience in the Atlantic and countless satisfied guests, we count as one of the most well-established and best-known dive centers on Fuerteventura. We are passionate about sharing the unique underwater world of the Canary Islands.
about.crewDesc: SSI and PADI certified instructors with years of experience in Atlantic waters
about.equipmentDesc: Well-maintained gear and boats. Complete equipment rental available.
about.awardsDesc: Recognized for excellence in diving safety and customer service

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Volume discounts apply automatically. The more you dive, the more you save!
pricing.snorkeling: Snorkeling: €38 (includes boat trip, suit, mask, snorkel, fins)
pricing.orientation: Orientation Dive: €32 (for certified divers, includes tank, weights, boat trip)
pricing.individualItems: Individual items: Suit €5, BCD €5, Regulator €5, Torch €5, Computer €3

profile.title: Personal Information
profile.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 10MB

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Management
privacy.exportData: Export My Data (GDPR Right to Data Portability)
privacy.exportDesc: You have the right to receive a copy of all your personal data in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format.
privacy.deleteDesc: You have the right to request deletion of your personal data. This action cannot be undone.

password.title: Change Password
password.passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 6 characters long

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone. All your personal data will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.confirm: I understand and want to delete my account

login.errorEnterBoth: Please enter both email and password
login.errorNoAccount: No account found with this email. Please register first.
login.errorGeneric: An error occurred. Please try again.
login.privacyIntro: We need your consent to process your personal data. Learn more in our
login.consentDataProcessing: Data Processing (Required): I consent to the processing of my personal data to provide dive booking services and manage my account.
login.consentMedicalData: Medical Data (Required): I consent to the processing of my medical information and certificates for diving safety purposes as required by Spanish maritime regulations.
login.consentMarketing: Marketing (Optional): I consent to receive promotional emails and newsletters about dive offers and updates. You can withdraw this consent at any time.
login.alertDataRequired: Data processing consent is required to create an account.
login.alertMedicalRequired: Medical data processing consent is required for diving services.

cookieBanner.title: Cookie Consent
cookieBanner.intro: We use essential cookies to ensure our website functions properly. These cookies are necessary for the website to work and cannot be disabled. We do not use tracking or analytics cookies without your explicit consent.
cookieBanner.byClicking: By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of essential cookies. You can learn more about our cookie practices in our

platformPrice.heroSubtitle: Professional dive center management software. GDPR compliant, hosted in France.
platformPrice.whyChooseUsDesc: Your data stays in Europe with full GDPR compliance.
platformPrice.diffGdpr: GDPR compliant — Your customer data is protected under EU regulation.
platformPrice.diffFrance: Hosted in France — Data residency in France. OVH/Scaleway infrastructure.
platformPrice.diffSeasonal: Seasonal plans — For centers open 6 months/year: pay only when active, low storage cost between seasons.
platformPrice.diffStorage: Storage billing — €2 per 5 GB/month for off-season data. Simple and transparent.
platformPrice.plansSubtitle: Yearly engagement, paid monthly, quarterly, semester or annually with discounts for commitment.
platformPrice.starterDesc: Ideal for single-location dive centers getting started
platformPrice.professionalDesc: For growing centers with multiple sites
platformPrice.paymentOptionsDesc: Choose your billing cycle. Longer commitments get better rates.
platformPrice.seasonalDesc: Many Mediterranean and seasonal dive centers operate 6 months per year. We offer tailored plans.
platformPrice.seasonal6moMonthlyDesc: Pay full monthly price during opening season. Data storage between seasons at €2/5GB/month.
platformPrice.seasonal6moOnceDesc: Pay 5 months price for the full season (≈17% discount). Storage between seasons at €2/5GB/month.
platformPrice.storageOffSeasonDesc: Keep your data without platform fee. Pay only €2 per 5 GB per month between seasons.
platformPrice.extraStorageDesc: Beyond plan limits: €2 per 5 GB per month. Same rate for in-season overage and off-season storage. Add-on tiers:
platformPrice.ctaDesc: Contact us for a demo or a custom quote.
